main event: A civilian woman reported seeing a single round, grayish object with a reddish tail in the sky near Hereford, Texas on August 2, 1965.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a grapefruit held at arm's length.
The object moved in a straight, descending path at a 45-degree angle before disappearing on the horizon.
The sighting lasted for only 1-2 seconds.
The observer was driving in a car at the time of the sighting and did not hear any sound from the object.
The report was considered unreliable due to the vague description and lack of confirming information from other sources.
sighted object: A single round, grayish object with a reddish tail
